snippet.title: THE RELIC  The First Guardian - Official Gameplay Reveal
snippet.description:
"Guardian, gather the pieces of the great relic and seal the void of darkness."

The Relic - The First Guardian is the first project of PROJECT CLOUD GAMES.

In this action RPG, you embark on a heroic adventure to save the world in the dark as the last guardian.
Start your journey as a guardian, gather pieces of great relic and close the void.


* 본 영상은 한글 자막을 포함하고 있습니다.

#TheRelic_TheFirstGuardian, #TheRelic, #The_Relic, #ProjectCloudGames, #PS5, #PS5_Store
